TextView.android:text: Electric vehicles are becoming bigger and bigger in today’s society and they aren’t going to stop soon. Electric vehicles are famous for being environmentally friendly. The sad truth is that electric vehicles are only good for the environment when the electricity in the area is coming from clean renewable sources. If the electricity comes from a coal or natural gas plant, the electric vehicle would be just as bad for the environment as a gasoline car. Hydro power is the number one source of electricity in Canada. Electric Vehicles have the potential to support a fully green and self-sustainable society, while Petrol and Diesel Vehicles do not. This is where Electric Cars show their true benefit. In a community that embraces such values like sustainability and caring for the environment, electric vehicles are a great option for anyone looking to buy a car. Electric Vehicles are a great investment, especially here in Canada, where we have about 70% clean, renewable energy.
